text: The National Geographic GeoBee (called the National Geography Bee from 1989 to 2000 and the National Geographic Bee from 2001 to 2018, also referred to as the Nat Geo Bee) is an annual geography contest sponsored by the National Geographic Society. It takes place every year in the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== * National Geographic Bee Official Website Category:Geography Category:Competitions Category:Events in the United States
title: National Geographic Bee
